## JsonRpcProvider.syncIncomingBlocks() method

returns a channel streaming incoming, potentially not yet synced block headers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
syncIncomingBlocks(cb: (blockHeader: BlockHeader) => void): Promise<void>;
```
